scripts.copy-libs: cp node_modules/leaflet-control-geocoder/dist/Control.Geocoder.js SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/js/lib/ && cp node_modules/leaflet-control-geocoder/dist/Control.Geocoder.css SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/css/ && cp node_modules/@turf/turf/turf.min.js SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/js/lib/ && cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.umd.min.js SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/js/lib/chart.js && cp node_modules/html2canvas/dist/html2canvas.min.js SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/js/lib/ && cp -r node_modules/@fontsource-variable/public-sans SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/lib/ && cp -r node_modules/@fontsource-variable/material-symbols-outlined SaveFW.Client/wwwroot/lib/
